entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
